p: We constructed a single crystal model of octogen (HMX) and performed shock wave tests using the newly developed dynamics simulation method. A series of shock waves, with a speed smaller than 5 km/s, were applied on the HMX model. As shown in Figure 1b, the obtained Hugoniot curve satisfactorily agreed with the experiments [ 17, 18, 19] and other calculations [ 20], thereby confirming the reliability of the current method.
